name: eBeat AI
description: innovation. Redefining how music is created, owned, and shared with eBeat AI. Driven by technological advancements and changing consumer preferences, eBeat AI stands at the forefront of this evolution, harnessing the power of artificial intelligence and blockchain to redefine music creation and distribution. User-Friendly Interface The Telegram bot interface makes it easy for anyone to start creating music, regardless of their musical background. Real-Time Creation Generate songs and lyrics on the spot, perfect for capturing inspiration as it strikes.
